node.doctext:
<COOLEDNODES><INFO sitename="Everything" site="http://everything2.com/" servertime="Fri Sep 7 00:30:06 2012">Rendered by the Cool Nodes XML Ticker</INFO> <cooled cooledby_user="decoy hunches" node_id="721083" parent_e2node="721056" author_user="icicle">Seriously, though, who the hell did I think I was going to become?</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="TerribleAspect" node_id="2069666" parent_e2node="1954644" author_user="triptychosis">beautiful light and inescapable gravity</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="wertperch" node_id="1738777" parent_e2node="26412" author_user="dannye">Deadhead</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Lometa" node_id="494334" parent_e2node="494330" author_user="flamingweasel">Matthew 26</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="dannye" node_id="2068345" parent_e2node="138450" author_user="wertperch">American Beauty</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Jet-Poop" node_id="2069705" parent_e2node="2061827" author_user="triptychosis">No, and I've always wanted to go. I memorized the inscription one time in school.</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="locke baron" node_id="2069717" parent_e2node="149712" author_user="Glowing Fish">I Had Trouble in Getting to Solla Sollew</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Jackson Mayhem" node_id="1502980" parent_e2node="670734" author_user="loquacious">I knew I couldn't build a cat</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="BranRainey" node_id="1422211" parent_e2node="1120652" author_user="magicmanzach">God comments his code, you should too</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="mauler" node_id="2069707" author_user="mr100percent"></cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Ashigaru" node_id="2069724" parent_e2node="2069728" author_user="legbagede">The history we chose not to write</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="marku" node_id="1327096" parent_e2node="1327095" author_user="Jet-Poop">Why I did what I did</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="wertperch" node_id="1532746" parent_e2node="332195" author_user="RalphyK">Spasm</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Jet-Poop" node_id="2069711" parent_e2node="2069710" author_user="lostcauser">Sometimes, I am cold, green water</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="per ou" node_id="1454691" parent_e2node="1453001" author_user="sekicho">Bashar al Assad</cooled>
</COOLEDNODES>
node.title: Cool Nodes XML Ticker
